name: Funny Bunny: Adventures
description:
Funny Bunny Adventures gives lots of fun.
At each level you must sow the accessible area with carrots and be in time for reaping the harvest. On the other hand, you must not be caught by various evil characters using the local relief and abilities of a good characters.

The game develops logical thinking and responsivity.
=== It is highly recommended for children! ===

Features:
  • Nice looking game with 2 difficulty modes: Easy (for the little ones) and Interesting.
  • Easy yet highly dynamic gameplay.
  • 3 magic worlds, 35 levels with rising challenge and many characters with different behaviors.
  • 26 easy to use upgrades and special abilities.
  • Lots of juicy effects.
  • Sweet unlockable bonus mini games for even more fun.
  • Achievements as additional challenge (16 in-game and 22 in Steam).
